data.text: Yahweh says that some day his temple will be on top of a mountain,
People from many nations will say to each other,
Yahweh will settle disputes between many people,
Everyone will sit peacefully under his own grapevines,
Many [HYP] of the people of other nations will worship [IDM] their own gods,
Yahweh says, â€œThere will soon be a time when I will gather the people whom I have punished,
My people who did not die while they were exiled will become a strong nation again.
As for you people of Jerusalem [MET],
So why [RHQ] are you wailing now?
Well, you people of Jerusalem should writhe and groan like [SIM] a woman who is having birth pains,
Now the armies of many nations have gathered to attack you.
But they do not know what I, Yahweh, think,
So, you people of Jerusalem, rise up and punish [MET] the nations who oppose you.
